metadata.title: CVE-2017-8824 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
The dccp_disconnect function in net/dccp/proto.c in the Linux kernelthrough 4.14.3 allows local users to gain privileges or cause a denial ofservice (use-after-free) via an AF_UNSPEC connect system call during theDCCP_LISTEN state.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-8824` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-4.4.0-116-generic - 4.4.0-116.140
